natta：n．[Sk．nakta．cf．nakkhatta] 夜．acc．nattaṃ 夜晚（by night）．nattam-ahaṃ 晝夜（by day and by night）．
natta：n．[Sk．nakta．cf．nakkhatta] 夜．acc．nattaṃ 夜に．nattam-ahaṃ 昼夜に．
